page.title: 02Education
page.content: The{nursery}in Tayport was founded on the 23rd of Aug 1976.It has 46 children and 4 members of staff.The age range is three and a half to five years old.Since the nursery was started 402 children have attended. The{primary school}in Tayport has been functioning for 110 years.It has 282 children in it and 12 teachers as well as temporary staff and remedial teachers.The age range is four and a half to twelve years old. Tayport school when it first opened was a secondary school.In the nineteen fifties it was made a primary school. The nearest{secondary}is Madras College in St Andrews and is approx' 11 miles away from Tayport.The pupils who live outside St Andrews are bussed to the school.The age range of the whole school is 11-18.
